Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurrences across all cases
Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that appears in variants with performance duration above the median variant duration
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection relative to the total number of SW-Awaiting AE Assignment occurrences
Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs more than once
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Initial Reviewer Selection is immediately followed by SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is not followed by any reviewer assignment activity (e.g., SW-AE Assign Reviewers, RW-AE Assign Reviewers, RSW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurring before SW-Reviewer Agreed in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection appearing in variants that eventually lead to SW-EIC Accept
Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is followed within 7 days by a reviewer-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that include at least one reviewer reminder (e.g., Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or 2)
Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in cases that ultimately result in rejection (e.g., SW-EIC Reject, SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit)
Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that is followed by a delay-indicating activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week, SW-Reviewer Selection is now due)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection compared to other initial selection activities such as RW-Initial Reviewer Selection and RSW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' activities or `ACTIVITY` == 'RW-Initial Reviewer Selection' or `ACTIVITY` == 'RSW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Percentage of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection that directly precedes a reviewer decline (SW-Reviewer Declined) without any intermediate assignment attempts
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' out of all cases
